name: UNSOLVED CASE (itch)
description:
Hello Guys!    This is my second game in the universe "Delivery for Dr. Shtraus".

This is an Adventure game with elements of Disco and Horror of course.

We play as a simple street guy named BAM,  who came to the police station to sign papers on his suspended sentence.  But, that evening, a prisoner arrived at the station, who told the detectives strange things.

CONTROLS MUSIC AND SOUND https://freesound.org/
